channel.title: Major Digest - Reliable and Comprehensive News Sources: sports
channel.description: Get the latest news online at Major Digest, the top online news resource for the most reliable news sources. Stay informed about the world around you!

image.title: Major Digest - Reliable and Comprehensive News Sources: sports

item.title: Dodgers force World Series to deciding Game 7 by holding off Blue Jays 3-1 as Yamamoto wins again
item.description: TORONTO (AP) — A two-run lead was starting to slip away from the Los Angeles Dodgers in the ninth inning — along with their chance to force the World Series to Game 7.
item.dc:creator: RONALD BLUM, Associated Press, PIX 11

item.title: Double trouble: Barger gets caught off second base as Blue Jays' rally fizzles in Game 6 of Series
item.description: TORONTO (AP) — Addison Barger was thinking base hit off the bat — and he was going to score the tying run for Toronto in the ninth inning Friday night. Then, in a flash, he got doubled off second and Game 6 was over. Just like that.
item.dc:creator: ROB GILLIES, Associated Press, KGET 17, NBC

item.title: NASCAR Commissioner Steve Phelps: 'We are trying our hardest' to settle antitrust lawsuit
item.description: AVONDALE, Ariz. (AP) — NASCAR Commissioner Steve Phelps said Friday “we are trying our hardest” to settle the federal antitrust lawsuit with the two teams suing the racing series in the most expansive comments yet from the defendants.
item.dc:creator: JENNA FRYER, Associated Press, PIX 11

item.title: NFL cracks down on Ravens with major fine tied to Lamar Jackson injury report
item.description: The NFL reportedly fined the Baltimore Ravens $100,000 for violating the league's injury report policy last week involving star quarterback Lamar Jackson.
item.dc:creator: Fox News

item.title: Zverev saves match points to set up Sinner semifinal at Paris Masters
item.description: Alexander Zverev has saved two match points to overcame Daniil Medvedev 2-6, 6-3, 7-6 and keep alive his Paris Masters title defense.
item.dc:creator: Associated Press, KPRC 2

item.title: Drake trolls Dodgers star Shohei Ohtani as Blue Jays reach cusp of World Series championship
item.description: Rapper Drake trolled Los Angeles Dodgers two-way star Shohei Ohtani on Instagram as the Blue Jays close in on their first World Series title since 1993.
item.dc:creator: Fox News

item.title: Lamar Jackson torches Miami with 4 TD passes in return from injury and Ravens rout Dolphins 28-6
item.description: MIAMI GARDENS, Fla. (AP) — Lamar Jackson returned for the Baltimore Ravens, and so did the chants of “M-V-P!” — on the road. Jackson threw for 204 yards and four touchdowns, showing little rust in his return from a right hamstring strain, and the Ravens routed the Miami Dolphins 28-6.
item.dc:creator: ALANIS THAMES, Associated Press, KGET 17, NBC

item.title: Wembanyama leads Spurs to their first 5-0 start with 27 points and 18 rebounds in win over the Heat
item.description: SAN ANTONIO (AP) — Victor Wembanyama had 27 points, 18 rebounds, six assists and five blocked shots, and the San Antonio Spurs improved to 5-0 for the first time in franchise history by beating the Miami Heat 107-101 on Thursday night.
item.dc:creator: RAUL DOMINGUEZ, Associated Press, KGET 17, NBC

item.title: Athlete of the Week: Cambelle Brammer
item.description: FRUITA, Colo. (KREX) – Cambelle Brammer is the KREX EXceptional student athlete of the week. She had 96 kills and 94 digs over her last five matches for the Fruita volleyball team. "I'm pretty competitive.
item.dc:creator: Jackson Cowen, KREX 5

item.title: Panthers star steps away from team to coach friend's youth hockey team for heartbreaking reason
item.description: Florida Panthers forward Brad Marchand stepped away to coach his friend’s U18 team in Halifax, honoring the memory of his friend’s 10-year-old daughter, Selah.
item.dc:creator: Fox News

item.title: Jason Kreis named RSL President of Soccer Operations
item.description: SANDY, Utah (ABC4 Sports) - Jason Kreis has a new role with Real Salt Lake. The former RSL player and head coach was named the team's President of Soccer Operations. Kreis returned to Real Salt Lake nearly two years ago as the team's Director of Club Operations and Special Projects.
item.dc:creator: Dana Greene, ABC 4

item.title: Snowbasin named #3 ski resort in the West
item.description: HUNTSVILLE, Utah (ABC4 Sports) - Snowbasin Resort has once again been recognized among North America’s best, earning the No. 3 spot in SKI Magazine’s “Top 30 Resorts in the West” for 2026.
item.dc:creator: Dana Greene, ABC 4

item.title: Guerrero homers off Ohtani as Blue Jays even World Series with 6-2 win over Dodgers in Game 4
item.description: Vladimir Guerrero Jr. hit a two-run homer off Shohei Ohtani in the third inning, Shane Bieber pitched four-hit ball into the sixth, and the Toronto Blue Jays got back on track with a 6-2 victory over the Los Angeles Dodgers in Game 4 of the World Series on Tuesday night at Dodger Stadium.
item.dc:creator: GREG BEACHAM, Associated Press, WGN 9

item.title: Utes getting ready for top-25 showdown against Cincinnati
item.description: SALT LAKE CITY (ABC4 Sports) - Pretty much everything went right for the Utes against Colorado Saturday night in a dominating 53-7 win. "You know, just all positives," head coach Kyle Whittingham said Monday. "Really nothing negative coming out of that game.
item.dc:creator: Dana Greene, ABC 4

item.title: Americans divided along party lines over Bad Bunny Super Bowl appearance: poll
item.description: (KRON) -- Americans are divided along political party lines over the NFL's decision to book Bad Bunny for this year's Super Bowl Halftime Show. That's according to a new Quinnipiac University Poll.
item.dc:creator: Alex Baker, KRON4

item.title: Former NFL center Nick Mangold dies seeking kidney transplant
item.description: His death comes less than two weeks after the two-time All-Pro selection announced on social media that he had kidney disease and needed a transplant.
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press, NewsNation

item.title: Utes trounce Colorado behind Ficklin's career night, 53-7
item.description: SALT LAKE CITY (ABC4 Sports) - Byrd is the word. Freshman Byrd Ficklin passed for two touchdowns and ran for another in his first career start to lead Utah to a 53-7 win over Colorado on Saturday night.
item.dc:creator: Dana Greene, ABC 4

item.title: BYU keeps rolling with 41-27 win at Iowa State
item.description: AMES, Iowa (ABC4 Sports) - There was no letdown after the rivalry game this time. Bear Bachmeier threw for 307 yards and two touchdowns, both to Parker Kingston, as the 11th-ranked Cougars came from 14 points down to beat Iowa State Saturday afternoon, 41-27.
item.dc:creator: Dana Greene, ABC 4

item.title: Aggies offense struggles in 33-14 loss at New Mexico
item.description: ALBUQUERQUE, N.M. (ABC4 Sports) - It was not a happy homecoming for Utah State head coach Bronco Mendenhall in New Mexico Saturday. D.J.
item.dc:creator: Dana Greene, ABC 4
